# Project Details

This project is written in TypeScript and React. Vite is used for building, ESLint for linting, and dprint for formatting.

## Code Review Instructions

When reviewing code, focus on high-level aspects like architecture and maintainability.

Do not bring up issues that are the responsibility of other tools, such as:

- Unreachable code
- Unused variables
- Exhaustivity checks
- Other code flow analysis
- Syntax
- Formatting
- Type safety

Do bring up issues that aren't covered by these tools, such as:

- Overall structure & design
- Potential bugs & edge cases
- Logical errors
- Code that is hard to understand or easy to misinterpret
- Code reusability problems
- Performance issues
- Bad practices & antipatterns
- Spelling mistakes
- Naming & structural inconsistencies
